content:
Check:
  all:
    - any:
        - name: TEDUR
          operator: empty
        - name: TEDUR
          operator: not_exists
    - any:
        - name: TEENRL
          operator: empty
        - name: TEENRL
          operator: not_exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000027
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Either TEENRL or TEDUR must be present for each Element.
Outcome:
  Message: At least one of TEENRL and TEDUR must be populated.
  Output Variables:
    - ETCD
    - TEDUR
    - TEENRL
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0328
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Either TEENRL or TEDUR must be present for each Element.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.2.2
              - Cited Guidance: At least one of TEENRL and TEDUR must be populated.
                  Both may be populated.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 12
                Section: 7.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TE

json.Description: Either TEENRL or TEDUR must be present for each Element.

Outcome.Message: At least one of TEENRL and TEDUR must be populated.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Either TEENRL or TEDUR must be present for each Element.
At least one of TEENRL and TEDUR must be populated. Both may be populated.
